alert.note: Alert for Camden; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden and southwestern Morgan Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laurie, or 13 miles west of Osage Beach, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Village of Four Seasons, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Linn Creek, Hurricane Deck, Old Linn Creek, Green Bay Terrace and Purvis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Missouri.
